description: My place is centrally located on a GORGEOUS tree-lined block, steps from Central Park, high-end retail, great coffee shops, Equinox, Trader Joes, Lincoln Center, and much more! Steps from 1/2/3 and B/C trains. I love my apartment and am happy to share my home to the right person or couple who will treat it like their own.  Preference for someone looking to rent Mon-Thurs or the whole week.  No pets, please.  Email me with any questions!   My place is good for couples and business travelers.
name: Upper West Side Sanctuary Chic
review: The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
